modifications.value: Master Chief has arrived on the island. Complete a match on Xbox Cloud Gaming to unlock a matte black style!
Marcus has arrived on the island. Complete a match on Xbox Cloud Gaming to unlock a matte black style!
Marcus and Kait have arrived on the island. Complete a match on Xbox Cloud Gaming to unlock a matte black style for Marcus!
